channel.title: AI.DEV Blog - AI & Machine Learning Insights
channel.description: Articles about AI, Machine Learning, LLMs, RAG systems, and modern web development

item.title: Building Production-Ready RAG Systems in 2025
item.description: A comprehensive guide to implementing Retrieval-Augmented Generation systems with LangChain, Pinecone, and GPT-4. Learn about chunking strategies, embeddings, and optimization techniques.
item.author: AI.DEV

item.title: Advanced Prompt Engineering Techniques for GPT-4
item.description: Master the art of prompt engineering with practical examples and best practices for GPT-4, Claude, and other LLMs. Includes tips on few-shot learning, chain-of-thought, and more.
item.author: AI.DEV

item.title: Vector Databases: A Deep Dive
item.description: Explore the world of vector databases including Pinecone, Weaviate, ChromaDB, and FAISS. Compare features, performance, and use cases for semantic search applications.
item.author: AI.DEV

item.title: Building AI Agents with LangGraph and Claude 3.5
item.description: Learn how to build autonomous AI agents using LangGraph for orchestration and Claude 3.5 for intelligence. Includes multi-agent systems, tool use, and best practices.
item.author: AI.DEV

item.title: Fine-tuning LLMs: A Practical Guide
item.description: Step-by-step guide to fine-tuning large language models using LoRA and QLoRA techniques. Includes dataset preparation, training strategies, and evaluation methods.
item.author: AI.DEV

item.title: Semantic Search with Embeddings
item.description: Implement powerful semantic search using sentence transformers and embeddings. Learn about hybrid search, reranking, and optimization techniques for production systems.
item.author: AI.DEV
